title: The Infinite Between

panel_structure.description: Evan and Architect stand at the threshold between spaces, reality shimmering like heat waves, their forms beginning to blur at the edges
panel_structure.focus: The space between certainty and possibility

panel_structure.description: Their reflections in the threshold surface show not who they are but who they're becoming - infinite variations overlapping

transformation_notes: The threshold becomes metaphor for their entire journey - neither here nor there, but vibrantly present in the between
